title: Instructional Strategy Design for Classical Chinese Poetry Education for International Chinese Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Chinese Character Literacy and Elementary Chinese Conversational Skills
context.additional_context: Workplace-external education program for adult science professionals. Combines collaboration and self-directed learning in BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) settings

learning_goals: Learners can classify 54 classical Chinese poems by genre/theme and analyze their statistical distribution.
Learners can visualize lexical and grammatical patterns applied in classical Chinese poetry texts through data visualization.
Learners can produce project outcomes by connecting cultural contexts reflected in classical poetry to case studies in scientific fields.

resources: Online Collaboration Platforms (e.g., Notion, Google Workspace)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
